conclusion: Analyze the flow direction and path of liquid through baffles A, B, C, and D.
Baffle A: The liquid flows downward.
Baffle B: The liquid flows downward.
Baffle C: The liquid flows downward.
Baffle D: The liquid flows downward.
Since all baffles are oriented downward, the liquid will continue to flow downward after passing through each baffle.
Identify the outflow points: The liquid will exit the baffles and flow into containers E and F.
Given the downward flow after each baffle, the liquid will continue downward after exiting the baffles.
Containers E and F are positioned directly below the baffles, with E on the left and F on the right.
The liquid will flow into both containers E and F.
Final Answer: The liquid will flow into both containers E and F.
